text: @SteveScalise COVID-19 cases are skyrocketing, and the virus will soon be uncontrolled. @SpeakerPelosi's decision is the wisest decision, especially considering the average age of the members of the House of Representatives is 57.8, that would put the body well into the high-risk group.
